name: Bree
headline: Chime for Canada, starting with cash advances
description: Bree is building a challenger bank for the 11 million Canadians living paycheck to paycheck, starting with interest-free cash advances. We make money through tips and an optional, same-day express fee. By solving our customers' most urgent problem—illiquidity between paychecks —our cash advance business is a cheap, but profitable and repeatable hook that builds distribution for a broader challenger bank. This represents a $9 billion revenue opportunity in Canada.

founders.name: Alexander Li, Founder
founders.description: Born in China, raised in Canada and currently based out of Vancouver. Studied CS + Business in college and did 2 years of investment banking at JP Morgan in San Francisco prior to working on start-ups.

founders.name: Adam Kang, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Bree. Previously worked in investment banking at J.P. Morgan and as a software engineer at Darkstore.

raw_markdown="[![Bree Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62c5a82c164fb80f06168a63_Logo%20-%20Black.svg)](https://www.trybree.com/</>)[About](https://www.trybree.com/</about>)[Blog](https://www.trybree.com/</blog>)[Reviews](https://www.trybree.com/</reviews>)[FAQ](https://www.trybree.com/</faq>)[Login](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/app.trybree.com/login>)

Join Bree Today
[Get Started](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/app.trybree.com/register>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62a208274b86c469d3256fc0_icon_plus.svg)
# Short on cash?We’re here to help.
Access up to a $500 cash advance to prevent overdraft.No interest or fees.
[Join Bree](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/app.trybree.com/register>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc6dfa1512a24dbeca2239_Header-Left.svg)![Illustration of a Father and daughter checking out at a grocery store](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc6266229e8c0cc97ebde5_Header-Right.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc5d032b55bd3668ba7e32_Header-Bird.svg)
## Loved by more than 350,000 Canadians
![Illustration of a bird carrying a paycheck](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc5ab080accf27ee460c7f_Pay%20when%20you%27re%20Paid-Front.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc593d87d8a3ee2e810f63_Pay%20when%20you%27re%20Paid-Back.svg)
## Pay us back when you get paid
Get a quick cash advance today, and then pay us back when you have enough money.
## No interest and no fees
We're serious - there are no surprises with our cash advances. Just tip us, like a waiter, if we helped. It helps us keep this service going so people don't resort to scummy payday lenders.
![Illustration of a pool floaty and drinks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc593e35125a7dcca9488b_No%20Fees-Front.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc593dafc44e823dbe0f6f_No%20Fees-Back.svg)
![Illustration of two mothers hugging their child](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc593ec9f4871e2dba9358_Best%20Interest-Front.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc593d2b55bd0336ba5828_Best%20Interest-Back.svg)
## Our only interest is your best interest
Our mission at Bree is to help Canadians like you move towards financial wellness. Through our budgeting tool and a weekly newsletter, we want you to take charge of your finances. 
[Join Bree](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/app.trybree.com/register>)
## Benefits of joining the Bree family
We’re here to help
![Magnifying Glass Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62c5a0d68924e70ed25b4be3_Magnifying%20Icon.png)
### No Fees
Get overdraft protection with no mandatory fees or interest payments.
![Wallet Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62c5a0d68d5ceb9e375e4d1d_Wallet%20Icon.png)
### Pay When You Can
No fixed terms. Pay us back when you are paid next, not when you can't.
![Clock Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62c5a0d6fc9eb283ee96125b_Stopwatch%20Icon.png)
### Fast & Easy
Sign up and apply for a cash advance within minutes. Get approved today.
![Illustration of comments of community support](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc5bd9bee59ebc460dd1e8_Community%20Illustration-Front.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc6d37e18114acc0b54da3_Community%20Illustration-Back.svg)
## Bree is Community Supported
![Key Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc5bf5db94a08353bf7f41_Choose%20what%20you%20pay.svg)
### Choose what you pay
With Bree, there are no mandatory fees or interest payments when you apply for a cash advance. You choose what you want to tip. This is a radical change from payday lenders that keep you trapped in debt.
![Paper Airplane Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62cc5bf56edd02c59f97d87a_Pay%20It%20Forward.svg)
### Pay it forward
The world is a better place when we help each other out. By tipping a little extra when you can, you help keep Bree running for everyone going through hard times.
[Join Bree](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/app.trybree.com/register>)
## Join **thousands of Canadians** who have received financing from us.
Our customers are our number one priority. See reviews from real customers below to see what Canadians are saying about their experience with Bree.
[See All Reviews](https://www.trybree.com/</reviews>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/6556a00ea9b7a2aebc025739_ahmad.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Ahmad
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/65569fc6be72406c609badbe_brett.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Brett
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/65569f8d7ab602f4831e56a5_brooke.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Brooke
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/65569f448bc490c550a69cdf_chidema.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Chidema
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/65569f0696095b72c328196c_ebony.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Ebony
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/65569ecdc717aee8b261cced_lara.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Lara
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/65569e7265d9c959d685fb48_rick.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Rick
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62be112a57ff15637f202679/65569e16e86b3de965213dc0_shannon.png)](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
### Shannon
[](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)[](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
[![Bree Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62a208274b86c4b7ff256f88/62c5a82c420774599a5e731b_Logo%20-%20White.svg)](https://www.trybree.com/</>)
[About](https://www.trybree.com/</about>)[Blog](https://www.trybree.com/</blog>)[FAQ](https://www.trybree.com/</faq>)[Log In](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/app.trybree.com/login>)[Sign Up](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/app.trybree.com/register>)
[](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/p/Bree-App-100064069361728/>)[](https://www.trybree.com/<https:/instagram.com/trybreeapp?igshid=OGQ5ZDc2ODk2ZA%3D%3D&utm_source=qr>)[](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)[](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)[](https://www.trybree.com/<#>)
Bree Technologies charges a monthly membership fee of CA$2.99 (a) after the 1-month free trial concludes for first-time customers and (b) immediately for customers returning for a second or subsequent membership. You can cancel your membership at any time.* There is a minimum period of 1 day set for the repayment of the loan. Extensions on the repayment period can be availed by contacting our support team. Please note, the maximum permissible period for repayment is 65 days from the date the loan is issued.** The APR on the amount drawn from Bree is 0%. APR refers to the annual rate, generally inclusive of interest rate plus fees and other costs for a year. However, we do not mandate any fees or interest charges, making our maximum APR 0%.*** To illustrate an example, if you were to receive a line of credit of $100 for a term of 30 days, under our terms, you would be obligated to repay exactly $100 if standard delivery was selected. There would be no additional fees or interest charged on this amount. In this example, on a $100 loan for 30 days, the interest rate is 0%, the total cost of borrowing is $0, with a total payback of $100, and an APR of 0%.By using this website and the mobile application, you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
© 2025 Bree Technologies Ltd. All rights reserved.
[Privacy Policy](https://www.trybree.com/</privacy-policy>)[Terms of Use](https://www.trybree.com/</terms-of-use>)

generated_description:
Bree is a Vancouver-based fintech startup that aims to transform financial wellbeing for the 11 million Canadians living paycheck to paycheck. Founded in 2021 as part of Y Combinator's S21 cohort, Bree is setting out to be a challenger bank with a keen focus on providing interest-free cash advances, addressing the urgent liquidity issues that many Canadians face.

Imagine needing to cover a bill before your next paycheck hits—Bree allows users to access cash advances up to $500 without any interest or hidden fees. The company makes its money through optional tips and a same-day express fee. This innovative approach not just meets an immediate need but lays the groundwork for a wider banking solution in the future. With an estimated $9 billion revenue potential in Canada for cash advances alone, Bree's business model is both profitable and scalable.

Bree’s mission, “Chime for Canada,” is all about empowering users towards financial wellness. They offer tools like budgeting help and a weekly newsletter that encourages better financial habits. In stark contrast to payday lenders, which often ensnare borrowers in a cycle of debt, Bree encourages a community-supported repayment model. Customers can tip Bree for its services, akin to leaving a gratuity for good service at a restaurant, fostering a sense of community and self-advocacy among users.

The startup operates with a tight-knit team of two and continues expanding its reach, currently boasting a loyal customer base of over 350,000. While Dalton Caldwell serves as a Group Partner, Bree remains laser-focused on supporting its users without the burden of traditional fees, offering them a chance to pay back at their own pace.

You can explore more about what Bree is up to on their [website](https://www.trybree.com/). If you're in Canada and often find yourself short on cash, Bree’s interest-free advances might just be the financial lifebuoy you've been looking for.
